patches.issue: Remove 64bit dispatching as not needed by libcudf and results in compiling twice as many kernels [https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/pull/11437]
Improve Thrust sort compile times by not unrolling loops for inlined comparators [https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/pull/10577]
Improve Thrust scan compile times by reducing the number of kernels generated [https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/pull/8183]
